comment: Very concerned about student needs adn email's are fast adn he goes extra mile if you ask for help.  this was online class and he really stayed w/ it and extremelly helpflul

One of the best professors I have ever had.  Your grade will reflect how much work you put into it.  Go to class, take notes, and do the homework.  You'll do fine.  He's super nice, funny, and approachable!

first time teaching this class.  The guy doesn't stop smiling.  He is the most helpful prof i have come across to the point he'll even help you DURING the test.  Easy to talk to, unintimidating, and doesn't make you feel stupid for asking something.  Do the hw and understand it for an A.  He is hard to get a hold of in vista and in his office.

Dr. Whittle is such a great professor! He really wants his students to succeed and will explain anything until you understand it. There are 8 pop quizzes and 1 midterm and a final but if you do all the hw then you should do fine on the pop quizzes. Dr. Whittle knows his material and you will learn a lot!

Professor Whittle is the best professor at KSU. Understands the calculus course to the fullest and more. Makes calculus fairly easy. Explains and answers any questions completely. Only grades in class are unannounced quizzes and tests (problems are from the homework assigned or very similar). Great professor. Highly recommended.
Anyone who could get me to learn calc is amazing in my eyes. Can't go wrong with prof. Whittle. Lot of work for a single class... but I got an A!

took online class. tests are lots of questions for little pts., so good for us. he even looks over test before you turn it in to give you last min. pointers on what to fix. class hard/easy depends on student. not much interaction btwn student & teacher. if send him question he'll answer, but not same as in class. still have to do a group project

Dr. Whittle is the most wonderful math teacher ever. He is so understanding with his students. If we do not understand a complex calculus problem, he will make sure that we do not leave until we do understand it. Calculus is not, by any means, an easy subject, but Dr. Whittle makes it feel as though it is a piece of cake! He is by far the best.

EXCELLENT teacher!!! I have NEVER liked any math class ever. He made calculus interesting. If you try and attend class, then he will help you succeed.  He wants people to do well.  He offers as much outside help as you need. He is wonderful and nice.  If you can get in his class then by all means take it!! We need 100 more Dr. Whittles!

He's wonderful. He explains calculus very well. I also give him props for writing all of his notes on the board. He's a sweetheart if you ever talk to him. He also grades the fairest that I've ever seen. If you can come up with something, somehow he'll give you points. He's a great guy and willing to help you succeed in math.

He's a great teacher, and you can tell he really wants everyone to succeed. He explains things well and is very straight-foreward about what is on his tests and quizzes. He offers tons of resources if you're struggling, and even his own personal time. His tests are sometimes a little harder than you expect, but he grades very nicely- the questions

He is an able math teacher with very good communication skills compared to other math teachers I know. He makes sure you are following him, keeps good eye contact, and gives quizes often so that you practice. He is generous when grading. Offers after class tutoring. Is young, energetic. Two exams (one midterm, one final), one project, and quizes.
he will find ways to help you if you're struggling. He cares about his students and tries to make sure you understand the material
